name: UI Components & Interface Sprites
description: Comprehensive sprite library for user interface components, layouts, forms, and interactive elements

forms.name: Form Elements
forms.description: Input fields, buttons, and form controls

text-input.name: Text Input Field
text-input.description: Standard text input field with border and placeholder styling
text-input.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="200" height="40" rx="4" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#d1d5db" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="8" y="8" width="184" height="24" rx="2" fill="#f9fafb"/><text x="12" y="24" font-size="12" fill="#9ca3af" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">Enter text here...</text><rect x="12" y="28" width="1" height="8" fill="#3b82f6"><animate attributeName="opacity" values="1;0;1" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite"/></rect>

button-primary.name: Primary Button
button-primary.description: Primary action button with hover and focus states
button-primary.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="120" height="40" rx="6" fill="#3b82f6" stroke="#2563eb" stroke-width="1"/><rect x="2" y="2" width="116" height="36" rx="4" fill="#4f46e5" opacity="0.1"/><text x="60" y="25" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14" fill="#ffffff" font-weight="600" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">Click Me</text>

checkbox.name: Checkbox
checkbox.description: Checkbox input with checked state indicator
checkbox.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="20" height="20" rx="3" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#d1d5db" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="2" y="2" width="16" height="16" rx="2" fill="#3b82f6"/><path d="M6 10 L9 13 L14 7" stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="2" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>

dropdown.name: Dropdown Select
dropdown.description: Dropdown selection menu with arrow indicator
dropdown.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="160" height="40" rx="4" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#d1d5db" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="8" y="8" width="144" height="24" rx="2" fill="#f9fafb"/><text x="12" y="24" font-size="12" fill="#374151" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">Select option</text><polygon points="140,15 150,15 145,25" fill="#6b7280"/>

layout.name: Layout Components
layout.description: Headers, sidebars, containers, and layout structures

header.name: Page Header
header.description: Website header with navigation and branding area
header.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="300" height="60" rx="4" fill="#1f2937" stroke="#374151" stroke-width="1"/><rect x="10" y="10" width="80" height="40" rx="4" fill="#3b82f6" opacity="0.2"/><text x="50" y="32" text-anchor="middle" font-size="12" fill="#ffffff" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">LOGO</text><rect x="120" y="20" width="60" height="20" rx="2" fill="#4b5563"/><text x="150" y="32" text-anchor="middle" font-size="10" fill="#ffffff" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">Navigation</text><rect x="200" y="20" width="60" height="20" rx="2" fill="#4b5563"/><text x="230" y="32" text-anchor="middle" font-size="10" fill="#ffffff" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">Menu</text>

sidebar.name: Sidebar Navigation
sidebar.description: Side navigation panel with menu items
sidebar.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="80" height="200" rx="4" fill="#f3f4f6" stroke="#e5e7eb" stroke-width="1"/><rect x="10" y="10" width="60" height="25" rx="3" fill="#3b82f6" opacity="0.1"/><text x="40" y="25" text-anchor="middle" font-size="9" fill="#374151" font-weight="600" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">Menu 1</text><rect x="10" y="45" width="60" height="25" rx="3" fill="#6b7280" opacity="0.1"/><text x="40" y="60" text-anchor="middle" font-size="9" fill="#374151" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">Menu 2</text><rect x="10" y="80" width="60" height="25" rx="3" fill="#6b7280" opacity="0.1"/><text x="40" y="95" text-anchor="middle" font-size="9" fill="#374151" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">Menu 3</text><rect x="10" y="115" width="60" height="25" rx="3" fill="#6b7280" opacity="0.1"/><text x="40" y="130" text-anchor="middle" font-size="9" fill="#374151" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">Menu 4</text>

card.name: Content Card
card.description: Card component with header, content, and action areas
card.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="200" height="150" rx="8" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#e5e7eb" stroke-width="1"/><rect x="0" y="0" width="200" height="40" rx="8" fill="#f9fafb"/><rect x="0" y="32" width="200" height="8" rx="0" fill="#f9fafb"/><text x="15" y="25" font-size="14" fill="#111827" font-weight="600" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">Card Title</text><rect x="15" y="55" width="170" height="4" rx="2" fill="#d1d5db"/><rect x="15" y="65" width="140" height="4" rx="2" fill="#d1d5db"/><rect x="15" y="75" width="160" height="4" rx="2" fill="#d1d5db"/><rect x="15" y="85" width="120" height="4" rx="2" fill="#d1d5db"/><rect x="15" y="110" width="80" height="25" rx="4" fill="#3b82f6"/><text x="55" y="125" text-anchor="middle" font-size="10" fill="#ffffff" font-weight="600" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">Action</text>

interactive.name: Interactive Elements
interactive.description: Modals, tooltips, notifications, and interactive components

modal.name: Modal Dialog
modal.description: Modal dialog overlay with content area and close button
modal.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="250" height="180" rx="0" fill="#000000" opacity="0.5"/><rect x="25" y="25" width="200" height="130" rx="8" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#e5e7eb" stroke-width="1"/><rect x="25" y="25" width="200" height="40" rx="8" fill="#f9fafb"/><rect x="25" y="57" width="200" height="8" rx="0" fill="#f9fafb"/><text x="40" y="48" font-size="14" fill="#111827" font-weight="600" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">Modal Title</text><circle cx="205" cy="45" r="8" fill="#ef4444"/><text x="205" y="49" text-anchor="middle" font-size="12" fill="#ffffff" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">Ã—</text><rect x="40" y="80" width="170" height="4" rx="2" fill="#d1d5db"/><rect x="40" y="90" width="140" height="4" rx="2" fill="#d1d5db"/><rect x="40" y="100" width="160" height="4" rx="2" fill="#d1d5db"/><rect x="40" y="125" width="70" height="20" rx="4" fill="#3b82f6"/><text x="75" y="137" text-anchor="middle" font-size="9" fill="#ffffff" font-weight="600" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">Confirm</text><rect x="125" y="125" width="70" height="20" rx="4" fill="#6b7280"/><text x="160" y="137" text-anchor="middle" font-size="9" fill="#ffffff" font-weight="600" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">Cancel</text>

notification.name: Notification Toast
notification.description: Toast notification with icon and message
notification.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="220" height="60" rx="6" fill="#10b981" stroke="#059669" stroke-width="1"/><circle cx="20" cy="30" r="8" fill="#ffffff"/><path d="M16 30 L19 33 L24 27" stroke="#10b981" stroke-width="2" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/><text x="40" y="25" font-size="12" fill="#ffffff" font-weight="600" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">Success!</text><text x="40" y="40" font-size="10" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.9" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">Operation completed successfully</text><circle cx="200" cy="15" r="6" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.3"/><text x="200" y="18" text-anchor="middle" font-size="10" fill="#ffffff" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">Ã—</text>

tooltip.name: Tooltip
tooltip.description: Tooltip with pointer and informational text
tooltip.svg: <rect x="10" y="0" width="100" height="30" rx="4" fill="#1f2937" stroke="#374151" stroke-width="1"/><polygon points="20,30 25,35 30,30" fill="#1f2937"/><text x="60" y="18" text-anchor="middle" font-size="10" fill="#ffffff" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">Helpful tooltip text</text>
